#include <iostream>
#include <stdio.h>
#include <vector>

using namespace std;

typedef long long int Lint;

int main() {
	
	Lint t, n = 1000001, i, j, v, k;

	vector<bool> A( n, true );
	vector<Lint> B( n );

	A[ 0 ] = A[ 1 ] = false;

	for( i = 2;( i * i )< n;i++ ) {

		if( A[ i ] ) {
			
			for( j = ( i * i ); j < n;j += i )
				if( A[ j ] )
					A[ j ] = false;
		}
		
	}

	
	B[ 0 ] = B[ 1 ] = 0;

	for( i = 2;i < n;i++ )
		if( A[ i ] )
			B[ i ] = B[ i - 1 ] + i;
		else
			B[ i ] = B[ i - 1 ];

	scanf("%lld", &t );

	while( t-- ) {
		
		scanf("%lld", &v );		
		printf("%lld\n",B[ v - 1 ] );
	}

	return 0;
}
